  1. from cms.plugin_base import CMSPluginBase
  2. from cms.utils.moderator import get_cmsplugin_queryset
  3. from cms.utils import get_language_from_request
  4. from cms.plugin_pool import plugin_pool
  5. from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _
  6. from models import InheritPagePlaceholder
  7. from django.conf import settings
  8. from cms.plugins.inherit.forms import InheritForm
  9. import copy
  11. class InheritPagePlaceholderPlugin(CMSPluginBase):
  12. """
  13. Locates the plugins associated with the "from_page" of an InheritPagePlaceholder instance
  14. and renders those plugins sequentially
  15. """
  16. model = InheritPagePlaceholder
  17. name = _("Inherit Plugins from Page")
  18. render_template = "cms/plugins/inherit_plugins.html"
  19. form = InheritForm
  20. admin_preview = False
  21. page_only = True
  23. def render(self, context, instance, placeholder):
  24. template_vars = {
  25. 'placeholder': placeholder,
  26. }
  27. template_vars['object'] = instance
  28. lang = instance.from_language
  29. request = context.get('request', None)
  30. if not lang:
  31. if context.has_key('request'):
  32. lang = get_language_from_request(request)
  33. else:
  34. lang = settings.LANGUAGE_CODE
  35. if instance.from_page:
  36. page = instance.from_page
  37. else:
  38. page = instance.page
  39. if not instance.page.publisher_is_draft and page.publisher_is_draft:
  40. page = page.publisher_public
  42. plugins = get_cmsplugin_queryset(request).filter(
  43. placeholder__page=page,
  44. language=lang,
  45. placeholder__slot__iexact=placeholder,
  46. parent__isnull=True
  47. ).order_by('position').select_related()
  48. plugin_output = []
  49. template_vars['parent_plugins'] = plugins
  50. for plg in plugins:
  51. tmpctx = copy.copy(context)
  52. tmpctx.update(template_vars)
  53. inst, name = plg.get_plugin_instance()
  54. outstr = inst.render_plugin(tmpctx, placeholder)
  55. plugin_output.append(outstr)
  56. template_vars['parent_output'] = plugin_output
  57. context.update(template_vars)
  58. return context
  60. def get_form(self, request, obj=None, **kwargs):
  61. Form = super(InheritPagePlaceholderPlugin, self).get_form(request, obj, **kwargs)
  63. # this is bit tricky, since i don't wont override add_view and
  64. # change_view
  65. class FakeForm(object):
  66. def __init__(self, Form, site):
  67. self.Form = Form
  68. self.site = site
  70. # base fields are required to be in this fake class, this may
  71. # do some troubles, with new versions of django, if there will
  72. # be something more required
  73. self.base_fields = Form.base_fields
  75. def __call__(self, *args, **kwargs):
  76. # instanciate the form on call
  77. form = self.Form(*args, **kwargs)
  78. # tell form we are on this site
  79. form.for_site(self.site)
  80. return form
  82. return FakeForm(Form, self.cms_plugin_instance.page.site or self.page.site)
  84. plugin_pool.register_plugin(InheritPagePlaceholderPlugin)
